original_text: The man was still holding Peter and John as they went into the yard of the temple. All the people were very surprised about what they saw. So they ran to Peter and John at the place called Solomon's porch.
korean_text: 나은 사람이 베드로와 요한을 붙잡으니 모든 백성이 크게 놀라며 달려 나아가 솔로몬의 행각이라 불리우는 행각에 모이거늘

sentences.original_text: The man was still holding Peter and John
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 여전히 베드로와 요한을 붙잡고 있었다

sentences.original_text: as they went into the yard of the temple
All the people were very surprised
So they ran to Peter and John
at the place called Solomon's porch
